ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: The organisation is to develop an enlightened, empowered and self-sustained rural community both materially and morally. The mission of AICMED is enlightenment and empowerment, particularly of the poor and the underprivileged, with special emphasis on women and the tribal people. The major objectives are, To encourage and develop adult education programme as a part of the development programme. To encourage and promote voluntary actions in the rural areas in favour of rural development and introduction of advanced technology. To organise workshop and prepare teaching and learning materials for various programme. To orient adult education functionaries and development activists of different levels so that they can undertake adult education and developmental programmes independently. To undertake research and promotional work to develop and sharpen existing technologies and methodologies of rural development.

ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: Patuli Mahila Uddyog Samity was Established in 1993 as non-profitable Voluntary organization which was fully organised by women with the mission to eradicate social evils comprising of iliteracy, Low income, human traffiking and other social and economic disparities with the help of NABARD, we started formation of SHGs mainly Constituted with poor women is rural areas.So far 633no of SHGs had been formed and 253no of SHGs had been credit linked. The SHGs are built, formed, Nurtured and credit linked with financial Institutions. In addition of formation of SHGs skill and capacity building training are also given for undertaking economic activities for their livelihood development. As the groups were facing difficulties for having loans from banks we are acting as MFI since 2001 and now the oustanding balance is Rs.82.17 Lakhs in Agricultural Cash Credit and Rs.131.59 Lakhs in Sahayog Niwas(Rural Housing Loan). This year we have started working as Business Correspondent of SBI with the target to open customer service point where savings Bank A/c to be opened in Zero Balance. Other term deposit A/c such as F.D/R.D etc. will also be opened there in future. We have the opportunity to open service point throughout the Nadia District. We had established one Child labour school under National Child Labour Project (Govt. of India) at Hanskhali in 2006 and another 4 schools had been opened this year. All together 5 such schools are running. Organised effort to check human traffiking, literacy campain and active participation for eradication of literacy through SHGs members are also being done.

ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: Peace India is a social Initiative for the walfare of poor and needy people. We focus on the area of Rights to information, Human rights, women empowerment, communal harmony. Under the banner of Peace India we are continuously running the campaign for Peace, Communal harmony, Human rights, civil rights, and all social activities for needy people like: 1. war against child labour 2. Beti Bachao Abhiyan 3. Vote to improve 4. Poverty Eradication 5. Think clean Go green We are working with dedication for the Noble cause of Human Rights Protection and Promotion, Justice for all, Economic upliftment of the underprivileged, Education, Love, Peace, Harmony and Friendship, National & International Integration by Exchange of ideas & ethos amongst the neighboring countries and the people of the rest of the world. Peace India is a Social helping hand and an Organization for the ignored, disregarded, over- looked, victimized oppressed, depressed, tortured people of the Society and it cultivates awareness in them with regards to their RIGHTS. Peace India helps alleviate poverty and social exclusion by facilitating empowerment of women and girls from poor and marginalized communities. Promoting Communal Harmony, Strengthening National Integration and Fostering Unity in Diversity through collaborative social action, awareness programs, reaching out to the victims of violence especially children, encouraging interfaith dialogue for Indiaâ€™s Shared Security, Peace & Prosperity. Peace India is working with dedication for the Noble cause of Human Rights Protection and Promotion, Justice for all, Economic upliftment of the underprivileged, Education, Love, Peace, Harmony and Friendship. Lots of people have joined our organization directly or via social media from all over India. Peace India has an equal eye for all political wings, Castes, Religion, Creed. Here in, we talk about pure humanism, Nationalism, Socialism Indian Nationalism. We seek a world of hope, tolerance and social justice, where poverty has been overcome and people live in dignity and security. India free from communal and all other forms of violence where all citizens especially children & youth live together in peace & harmony. Our Vision is to make a Team of Indians and protect our Countryâ€™s People from all kind of Illegal activities. We will always be there for the People who need us. â€œUnited we stand, Divided we Fallâ€

ngoList.title: RADHANAGAR DARPAN CULTURAL ORGANISATION
ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: Radhanagar Darpan Cultural Organisation was formed in the year of 2000 and got registration on 4th January 2002 with certain objectives of which a few of them stated below :- 1. To study and demonstrate the art of drama. 2. To focus social scenario of Indian society by dint of drama and try to find out ways and means of solution. 3. To alleviate aged, sick, helpless and indigent students and persons. From the beginning this organization composed â€œNew Dramaâ€ every year and staged in different districts, villages and town of West Bengal and some States in India. (Delhi), Assam, Bhilai, Nagpur, Bihar etc.) Those dramas are replica of social scenario. Most of all places we got huge prizes, praise and honour. Even in All Indian Competition this organization participated five times and got prizes at five times, Best production, 2nd Best Production, 3rd Best Production etc. with Best actress and Best Director. Above all we achieved to penetrate and reach in to the mind of general people by showing our drama. More over this organization teaches act of drama to the indigent children and every year arranged to perform a drama by them for developing their culture and social education. Besides in every year Radhanagar Darpan Cultural Organisation almost try to help poor, helpless students. This organization tries their best to associate with various social welfare activities. Following dramas are being produced by Radhanagar Darpan till 2009. 1. Choreder Lojjya holo 2. Sabitri 3. Kalo Banser Sanko 4. Tomar Sankho 5. Jalghori 6. Ek Nakhatrer Abela 7. Taraka 8. Harae Khunji 9. Chakhudaan Some of the aforesaid dramas are awarded and actress of these dramas got few award from different organization. Radhanagar Darpan Cultural Organisation belives in heart that theatre can build up better culture and society.

ngoList.detailsOfAchievement: In the year 2002 some educated youths decided to do some social work, so they came together and started a welfare organization. In the summer months to meet the shortfall of blood they began with a â€œBLOOD DONATION CAMPâ€ For nearly a week they campaigned throughout the local area and its neighborhood requesting people to donate blood explaining to one and all, that donating blood is essential, as all of us need it at the time of sickness, operation, natural calamities etc. The response from the citizens was good as 200 people donated blood. In the beginning we called himself â€œYouth Forumâ€ but later we changed the name to â€œRAGHUNATHPUR ALOâ€. Thus began the journey of Raghunathpur Alo. Every year in the month of July a Blood Donation is organized along with an Eye Check-up camp, ECG, Blood Sugar Check-up is done free of cost, mostly for poor people from the backward classes who cannot afford it. Water is provided to people who visit deferent fair, Charak Mela and also Book fair. Also those who are in need of medical attention are taken to hospital, dead people are taken for cremations etc, and all these are done voluntary by the ALO members. In the year 2010 a charitable hospital was established in memory of late Jayanta Naskar who was a well-respected teacher. The hospital was named Jayanta Naskar Memorial Charitable Dispensary. Dr I. Islam(Eye), Dr. J.N.ROY(M.D), Dr. Hussain(Homeopath) visit patient there. Every Wednesday Dr. Hussain(Homeopath) visits the dispensary, treats and provides medicines to poor people free of cost. Aloâ€™S member Chandana Roy assists the visiting doctors. Dr J.N.ROY(M.D, Aleopathic), Dr I. Islam(Eyespecialist)also provide their expertise free of cost. Nearly 70-100 patients are treated every week. In 2007 during the floods of â€œAYLAâ€ nearly two truckload of garments, biscuits, bottles drinking water were taken to Sunderban area of West Bengal and distributed to the affected people. During that time all the members of ALO and the local people came forward to help.
